==Welcome to documentation for TINE
This website is about TINE(Is Not an Emulator), which this wiki server is running on and is an implementation of a TempleOS kernel loader that works on Linux,Windows and FreeBSD. Code here should work also under TempleOS. Here are some links to get started,but this website is still under construction. If you want to Contibute,you'll have to ask *enzymical@duck.com* as this server is under development.
